OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD FIRST HEALTH AND WELL-BEING PARTNERSHIP

Desc.entry: Aims to improve the health of people of all ages and safeguard, support and improve the independence and well-being of all adults. Champions social inclusion across the whole Sheffield First Partnership and ensures that the needs of excluded groups maintain a high profile in the city. Promotes and seeks to embed the World Health Organisation (WHO) 'Healthy City' approach to Sheffield, achieving health for all through a partnership approach that focuses on what determines health and involves local people.

ContactName.entry: Chris Shaw, Director of Health Improvement
